special_text:
Recipe [i](Exile this as it resolves with a cooking counter on it. Then you may put an “I”, “II”, and “III” ingredient you own in exile with cooking counters on them onto the battlefield merged as a Saga enchantment with their names, colors, and chapter abilities.)[/i]
[level 2] Return another target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand.
notes:
New card — Replaced And Make Enough for Friends
III —> II
Make Enough for Friends felt a bit like a rare, and given we aren’t happy with the rare cycle at the moment, I figured reworking it at a higher rarity and making space for a less narrow (not that Make Enough had a particuarly bad or narrow floor, to be fair) uncommon recipe was a good path for both the uncommon and rare blue recipes.
